tweets.text:
Thames Water have got away with this stuff for too long. I used to walk along the little River Windrush every week, it was sparkling and filled with life. Now also foully polluted by Thames Water. 

Thames Water fined ¬£2.3m for Henley fish-death pollution https://t.co/OCx1jFfwOj
@Rebecca23910651 @maricaoneill @MissMaisyDaisy @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe Apparently the locals are too scary. üòÇüôÑ

Our homes are acting as incubators.. they fill up overnight and by morning it feels like you could pass out @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe https://t.co/Cwp79hXO8S

We recognise concerns about odour around #WalleysQuarry landfill & how difficult this is for local people. We‚Äôve had officers out today to check odour & will continue to do so. We‚Äôre aware of increased wait times on our hotline so please remember you can email us too. https://t.co/Oj3QeLcCfq

We're asking our members who have been affected by large-scale waste crime to participate in the @EnvAgency's National Waste Crime Survey 2021. You have until the 22 March to have your say. Visit NFU Online to find out more üëâ https://t.co/5lQzDPg2IU https://t.co/Yg9y2j7ly1

A positive day for our smelt tagging programme, which aims to identify where smelt are spawning within the river Wyre. Four individuals tagged this morning, not many but 100% better than last time. Check out the gnashers! Good to see lots of juvenile bass as well. ü•í https://t.co/LArkHcxWZo
Joint patrols with the wild crime unit, @EnvAgencySE tackling fish theft and illegal fishing. https://t.co/byg0UPHVlY

tweets.text: Really interesting comments on https://t.co/ehpBmj0t2v about the upcoming Terry Avenue closure. Nobody wants to oppose flood defences, but the way this has been leveraged by @CityofYork and @EnvAgencyYNE to evade proper mitigation is appalling https://t.co/7lFoQeJtHJ

Just to remind you all that just 24 hours ago the @EnvAgency admitted it will no longer be publishing serious pollution incidents and won't be recording them against their annual performance targets. https://t.co/Cu3VPjycTa

@sarahjolly1 @JDearnshaw @sarahjolly1 @JDearnshaw Thank you so much for getting back to us Sarah. I've just had a quick look for you but, unfortunately, the river isn't under our responsibility. It might belong to @EnvAgency ? Best wishes, Clara

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

tweets.text:
Localised minor inland flooding impacts are possible on Wednesday and into Thursday, but the overall flood risk remains VERY LOW for the next five days.
https://t.co/8BDNluUtSi https://t.co/MZtFmPfJgr

Following months of delays due to poor weather, the @ChesterHouse_UK mooring construction is now underway and due to be completed later this month. @nenescape @EnvAgency @_NeneValley @ChesterHouse_UK @HeritageFundUK @NNorthantsC https://t.co/GeCcAsIuE4

I sat in UK Fire Conference a decade ago where an @EnvAgency rep highlighted risks of the #climatecrisis

What proper sectoral prep has been made?

Flood response still isn't even a statutory duty in Eng. FRS needs frontline investment, not cuts. #Foreseeable #FundTheFrontline https://t.co/PuB7c1vVU5

@XmoSteve @maidstonebc Hi Steve, thanks for contacting us and providing a video of the pipe. We have alerted our property team at Maidstone and they will resolve this issue as soon as possible, thanks.
Julie Evans, National Federation of Builders, "we already have the skills & products to meet the challenge of climate change" #environment10
@EnvAgencySE @MariaHerlihyEA @EnvAgency there is a tree stuck in the middle of your lock cut top side of sunbury https://t.co/l88bSKbecV

New @nationaltrust map shows different layers of potential #climatecrisis impacts by 2060.

- High heat & humidity South-East of England 
- Storm damage, landslides & flooding would become common & more widespread. 
- Coastal erosion & flooding.
https://t.co/YtOeyAoi9V https://t.co/x2u3NOnTpS

urls.description: How to make a complaint about the Environment Agency‚Äôs service or appeal against a regulatory decision.

tweets.text: Should local residents wish to make a complaint with regard the failure of the @EnvAgency they can use the following link and procedure below. Residents should also make @StinkStopthe and @DaveJonesNuL aware of the responses you receive. https://t.co/9yOz7jDGtY

@CRTContactUs @JDearnshaw River Calder at Horbury Bridge. If you walk down the footpath to the right of Curve, Bridge Rd, Horbury, Wakefield WF4 5NN going behind the industrial buildings. https://t.co/v8WJWvFFzU

urls.title: Reduce the Environmental Impact of Oil
urls.description: The Oil Care Campaign is a joint initiative to provide advice - helping you look after, recycle and reduce the environmental risk of oil

tweets.text:
Any oil leak, no matter how small, can be devastating for aquatic wildlife, birds and fish.

After the recent cold weather now is a good time to check your domestic oil tank for weakened joints and damaged underground pipes.

For more information: https://t.co/UF6jGHz65H https://t.co/Z9RY2UySjj

tweets.text: Mattresses. Sofas. Duvets. Industrial fridges. Bags and bags of plastic. From the River Crane. Decided to take action after authorities failed the environment. @FriendsRivCrane @GuyLambert @CVP_CraneValley @CanLager @HestonActionG @CanalRiverTrust @EnvAgency @LlangattockPick https://t.co/loCt8HiweY

A head teacher of a local school is saying this @ClareDinnisEA & @EnvAgencyMids and in the last few days @KeeleUniversity @StaffsFire @NewsNBC have joined residents, our MP @AaronBell4NUL and others asking for real action not ‚Äòminor‚Äô action. You have the power. #sortitout https://t.co/83B6vXgBZp

ESA are encouraging as many #members as possible to complete the @EnvAgency #WasteCrime survey, which is open for responses until Monday 22nd March | https://t.co/2x35CLnCrN

There has never been a more important time to help the EA to build a robust baseline of data https://t.co/z2N8T5pK1A

@EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA Still no apology to residents  following last week's debacle when you failed to send an investigator all weekend and you found out the monitor wasn't working on Monday or that it was never connected on safety grounds (as you told both stories)

@EnvAgencyMids You may recognise "concerns" @EnvAgencyMids, unfortunately you don't seem to be able to find the actual odour. 6000 people would be quite happy to point you in the right direction #stopthestink @StinkStopthe

@SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids I am sure everyone will agree with me and express our gratitude towards Simon and Aaron for all the effects and getting behind the community  with horrendous stink and pushing for answers and it resolved
